<h2>Latest News</h2>

* Congratulations to Dr Nuwani Palihawadana, on being conferred the doctorate!

* Welcome to visitors [Heather Turner](https://www.heatherturner.net), [Simon Urbanek](https://urbanek.info) and [Nick Tierney](https://www.njtierney.com) visiting in November.  [Natalia Da Silva](https://natydasilva.github.io/natydasilva/) and [Ignacio Alvarez](https://github.com/nachalca) from Universidad de la Rep√∫blica, Montevideo, Uruguay, are with us until the end of 2025.

* We are hosting [R Dev Day](https://contributor.r-project.org/events/r-dev-days/) November 21 at 750 Collins. 

* [NUMBAT Hackathon](https://github.com/numbats/numbathackathon/issues) is running November 18-20. There are many projects being worked on.

* [WOMBAT (Workshop Organised by the Monash Business Analytics Team) 2025](https://wombat2025.numbat.space) was held Sep 29-30 in Melbourne. 

* Farewell to [David Wu](https://github.com/dwu0042) who has been a valuable member of NUMBATs for several years. Wishing him the best in his future endeavours.

* NUMBATS is offering regular workshops for the Monash Community. See the [workshop page](https://numbat.space/workshops/) for current details. 

* Monash Master of Business Analytics: Strap on an explorer's backback and a skeptics hat and learn how to analyse data. [Find out more.](https://www.monash.edu/business/master-of-business-analytics#events)

* The real numbats could use your help. If you would like to help with numbat conservation take a look at Project Numbat. You can buy numbat souvenirs or make donations to help with numbat conservation. Go to [Project Numbat](http://www.numbat.org.au).
